downloadDescription: The Lync 2010 training videos are Windows Media Video (.wmv) format versions of the videos presented in Lync 2010 self-paced training courses.
detailsSection: The Lync 2010 training videos are Windows Media Video (.wmv) format versions of the videos presented in Lync 2010 self-paced training courses. These videos can be posted to a company’s intranet site or incorporated into a company’s training plans. To access Lync 2010 training courses online, visit: http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=219056.
systemRequirementsSection: Microsoft Word 2010; Microsoft Office Word 2007; Microsoft Office Word 2003; Microsoft Office Word 2002
installInstructionSection: To install the download, save the file to a directory on your computer. After you save the file, open the document as you typically would. To remove the download, delete the file from the directory where you saved it.
